attributes.title: Fake news
attributes.review: The Trumpites are really good about forming little bubbles with fellow bigots, this app is of course no different. Please, please consider reading real, unbiased news and stay far away from anything Trump has his name on — his scams know no bounds.

attributes.title: Confusing
attributes.review: This app is so messy and confusing. I barely knew what to do once i opened the app. And also this doesn’t seem to satisfy me. If only this app was much organized and in detail, i’d rate it 4+ stars.

attributes.title: MY PHONE IS ON FIRE!!! 🔥🔥🔥
attributes.review: It was so weird as soon as I downloaded the app my phone caught fire! It’s almost like it’s the devil’s app or something... but maybe I’m just tripping. Okay I gotta go now cause I’m burning my finger prints off but be careful!!!

attributes.title: Lots of bugs, not intuitive
attributes.review: Said I followed 5 already for the day and hadn't. Please fix the bugs and don’t limit people

attributes.title: Fun app!
attributes.review: Spare/Share this app! Love this social especially for Trump supporters. Thank you very much.

attributes.title: Get on board the Trump Reign
attributes.review:
Since I have this on my phone I can just show it to people and no one questions me about anything. Get pulled over.” Fake news”

Wonder if the Lincoln Project has an app?

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Do not use this app. It is terrible. If I could make the worst app ever I think this would be it. I wanted to give it a zero star review but I guess that wasn’t an option. Oh well.  Go to hell cheeto 🧚

attributes.title: Don’t download this
attributes.review: Honestly it took forever to download it’s not worth getting it and it tries to take all your information and data which is not good worst app ever.

attributes.title: ONE STAR
attributes.review: When I first downloaded it I immediately jumped from my seat! I saw the orange guy! That picture almost gave me a heart attack! Then when I went to sleep I dreamt of the orange guy saying “TRUMP 2020” I was so terrified!!! Then when I woke up I was in sweat and tears!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS TERRIFYING APP

attributes.title: AWFUL, DONT RECOMMEND!!!
attributes.review: stan harry styles for clear skin🧚🏻‍♀️❤️ this a terrible app i would never recommend. this app makes you put in very personal information that would make anyone very uncomfortable. #niallhoran2020
